segments.text: Hey , Zina . You're here early today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I'm going to be making phone calls all day . What a blast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just wanted to say thanks for putting us on the map so fast . I appreciate it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Save it , Vince . After I put my first million in the bank , I'll say you're welcome .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fair enough.Keep up the good work .
segments.speaker: S1
